title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: There is excessive flashing happening in the Control Example.
OB: The entire screen is constantly being repainted, causing a lot of flashing.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, minimizing the flashing.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Observe the excessive flashing happening on the screen.
3. The entire screen should not be constantly repainted.
